links.title: How To Add A Security Key To Your Gmail (Tech Solidarity)
links.description:
Your primary email (the one you give to banks, social media sites, etc.) is the most important online account you have.  If an attacker can take over your primary email account, they can reset passwords on every other service that uses that email for account recovery.

A security key is a physical token (similar to a thumb drive) that offers you the highest possible level of protection against impostor websites that trick you into typing your Gma...

How much can we infer about a person's looks from the way they speak? In this
paper, we study the task of reconstructing a facial image of a person from a

correlations that allow it to produce images that capture various phys...

https://t.co/9iKwjRtKEB

@Bing should only ever show the first domain (itracking[.]services) instead of attempting to resolve redirect chains, which resulted in this vuln”

links.title: Andromeda–Milky Way collision - Wikipedia
links.description: The Andromeda–Milky Way collision is a galactic collision predicted to occur in about 4.5 billion years between two galaxies in the Local Group—the Milky Way (which contains the Solar System and Earth) and the Andromeda Galaxy.[1][2][3][4][5] The stars involved are sufficiently far apart that it is improbable that any of them will individually collide.[6] Some stars will be ejected from the resulting galaxy, nicknamed Milkomeda or Milkdromeda.
